subject: Fix auth flow: detect existing sessions and correct navigation routes
body:
- SupabaseAuthManager.onUserChanged() now immediately checks for existing session
- AuthCallback redirects to / instead of non-existent /assets route
- Actions.tsx navigation updated from /assets to /wallet
- Add providers.ts with Google Drive API discovery document

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
title: Fix auth flow: detect existing sessions and correct navigation routes
